faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.a1: Cost per use is a simple formula: the total price of an item divided by the number of times you use it. It tells you the real value of a purchase — a £200 jacket worn 200 times costs just £1 per use, while a £50 jacket worn 5 times costs £10 per use. Cost per use helps you see past the price tag.
faq.a2: No. Skip Or Buy: Worth It? is a one-time purchase. You pay once (£4.99 / $4.99) and own it forever. There are no subscriptions, no ads, and no in-app purchases.
faq.a3: The app includes 33 built-in categories covering everything from clothing and footwear to electronics, kitchen items, furniture, fitness gear, beauty products, and more. Each category comes with real-world benchmarks so you can see how your cost per use compares.
faq.a4: No. The app works completely offline. All calculations happen on your device. You don't need an internet connection to use any feature.
faq.q5: Is my data stored in the cloud?
faq.a5: No. All your data — saved items, photos, calculations — is stored locally on your device. We don't have accounts, cloud storage, or any way to access your data. Your information stays on your phone.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Skip Or Buy: Worth It? ("the App") is developed and maintained by Skip Or Buy ("we", "us", "our"). We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains what data the App collects (or doesn't) and how it is handled.
privacy.dataStorage: All data you create in the App — including saved items, photos, calculations, and preferences — is stored locally on your device. We do not operate any cloud storage, user accounts, or synchronisation services. Your data never leaves your phone.
privacy.analyticsIntro: We use Aptabase, a privacy-focused and GDPR-compliant analytics service, to collect anonymous usage statistics. This helps us understand how the App is used so we can improve it. Aptabase does not collect personally identifiable information. The data collected includes:
privacy.analyticsItem2: Feature usage counts (e.g., how often calculations are made)
privacy.analyticsItem5: Country-level location (derived from locale, not GPS)
privacy.analyticsOutro: No personal data, names, email addresses, IP addresses, or device identifiers are collected.
privacy.camera: The App may request access to your camera or photo library so you can attach photos to saved items. These photos are stored locally on your device only. We never upload, transmit, or access your photos in any way.
privacy.thirdParty: The App does not include any advertising SDKs, tracking pixels, social media SDKs, or third-party data-sharing integrations. The only third-party service used is Aptabase for anonymous analytics as described above.
privacy.dataSharing: We do not sell, rent, trade, or share your data with any third party. Since all user data is stored locally on your device, we have no access to it.
privacy.children: The App is not directed at children under 13. We do not knowingly collect any personal information from children.
privacy.deletion: Since all data is stored locally on your device, you can delete it at any time by clearing the App's data in your device settings or by uninstalling the App.
privacy.changes: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page with an updated "Last updated" date.
